title: Explore Outdoors App - Project-1
synopsis: This application was built with third-party APIs: National Parks, Map Box API and Open Weather API powered by JavaScript code.

title: MERN-Google-Books-Search
synopsis: A new React-based Google Books Search app. Node, Express and MongoDB are used for users be able to save books to review or purchase later.

title: Nosql-Workout-Tracker
synopsis: This app Workout Tracker is built with Express and connected with Mongo database with a Mongoose schema.

title: Cinder - Project-2
synopsis: Social networking platform with using Google API, Express, Socket.io, MySql, Passport, Hanlebars, Bulma, Sequelize.

title: Work Day Scheduler
synopsis: This app will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML, CSS powered by jQuery, using the Moment.js library and local storage.

title: React-Employee-Directory
synopsis: React application which UI is broken into components, it manages component state, and responds to user events.

title: PWA-Online-Offline-Budget-Trackers
synopsis: Budget Tracker Application (PWA) offline (IndexedDB, Service Worker) the user's inputs are shown on the page, and added to DB (MongoDB Atlas) when back online.

title: Weather Dashboard
synopsis: Third-party API with specific parameters to a URL. This app runs in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS.

title: Node-Express-Handlebars - Eat-Da-Burger!
synopsis: This application is a burger logger created with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!). It was designed the MVC pattern.

title: New York Times Search
synopsis: Bootstrap layout with search input boxes. AJAX call to retrieve data with searching keys powering with jQuery.

title: Password Generator
synopsis: App generates a random password. All characters are determined by ascii code. There are series of prompts/confirms for password criteria.

title: Code Quiz
synopsis: This app runs in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript code. It also features a clean and polished user interface.

title: Good-README-Generator
synopsis: a command-line application that dynamically generates a README.md from a user's input powered with Using Node.js using ES6+.

title: OOP: Template Engine - Employee Summary
synopsis: App is built with Node CLI that takes in information about employees and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person using JEST testing and OOP.
